artist: Artist: Aristide Maillol; Author: Pierre de Ronsard; Publisher: Ambrose Vollard
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: unbound paper-covered book with loose pages; cream-colored cover with central image of a woman seated under a tree with her knees drawn up, with the hem of her skirt riding up, showing her slip and the top of her stockings; title on front cover; image on back of cover of striding woman; text/poems with images of figures, including some couples; some pages folded and some unfolded
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: Livret de Folastries
